content: Embed a file selector to allow users to access any file from the list of the available ones.

comment.text: "This translation key is used to describe a file selector component, allowing users to access any file from a list of available options. It appears in UI elements such as buttons and dialogues, where it provides context to help users understand the purpose of the file selection functionality."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'قم بتضمين محدد الملفات للسماح للمستخدمين بالوصول إلى أي ملف من قائمة الملفات المتاحة.' is a literal translation but doesn't flow naturally in Arabic. A more natural phrasing would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: يمكنك إضافة محدد ملفات لتمكين المستخدمين من الوصول إلى أي ملف من قائمة الملفات المتاحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Вградете селектор на файлове, за да позволите на потребителите да имат достъп до всеки файл от списъка с наличните" is slightly verbose and not as concise as the English original.  'Имат достъп' (have access) is a bit awkward. A more natural phrasing would convey the meaning of 'allow users to access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Вградете селектор на файлове, за да позволите на потребителите да имат достъп до всеки файл от наличния списък.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Vložte selektor souborů' (Insert a file selector) is somewhat literal. A more natural phrasing would be 'Přidejte selektor souborů' (Add a file selector) or 'Implementujte selektor souborů' (Implement a file selector).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Přidejte selektor souborů

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'libovolnému souboru' (any file) is grammatically correct but could be slightly improved for clarity and flow. While not strictly incorrect, a more natural option exists.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: jakémukoliv souboru

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Betten Sie eine Dateiauswahl ein...' is overly formal and literal. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Fügen Sie eine Dateiauswahl hinzu...' or 'Integrieren Sie eine Dateiauswahl...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fügen Sie eine Dateiauswahl hinzu, um Benutzern den Zugriff auf jede Datei aus der Liste der verfügbaren Dateien zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Dateiauswahl' is correct, the repetition of 'Datei' could be improved for readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Fügen Sie eine Dateiauswahl hinzu, um Benutzern den Zugriff auf alle Dateien aus der Liste der verfügbaren Dateien zu ermöglichen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Incruste un selector de archivos para permitir a los usuarios acceder a cualquier archivo de la lista de disponibles' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Spanish.  'Embed' can have multiple nuances, and a more natural phrasing might be 'Incluya' or 'Añada' depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incluya un selector de archivos para permitir a los usuarios acceder a cualquier archivo de la lista disponible.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Upota tiedoston valitsija salliaksesi käyttäjien käyttää mitä tahansa tiedostoa käytettävissä olevien tiedostojen luettelosta' is a literal translation and sounds awkward in Finnish.  A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Lisää tiedostonvalitsin, jotta käyttäjät voivat valita minkä tahansa tiedoston käytettävissä olevasta listasta'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lisää tiedostonvalitsin, jotta käyttäjät voivat valita minkä tahansa tiedoston käytettävissä olevasta listasta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Intégrez le sélecteur de fichiers pour permettre aux utilisateurs d'accéder à tout fichier à partir de la liste des fichiers disponibles' is somewhat literal and not as fluent as it could be. While technically correct, 'embed' implies more than just 'integrate'. The wording is a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Incorporez un sélecteur de fichiers pour permettre aux utilisateurs d'accéder à n'importe quel fichier de la liste disponible.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "մուտք գործել" (mut'k gor'el) is a bit formal and clunky in this context. A more natural phrasing would be "ստանել" (stanel) or "տեսնել" (tesnel).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ներդրեք ֆայլերի ընտրիչ, որպեսզի օգտվողները կարողանան ստանել ցանկացած ֆայլ առկաների ցանկից:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "առկաների ցանկից" (arkyaneri tsankits) technically translates to 'list of available ones', it's a bit stiff. A more fluent and understandable translation would be 'պահվողների ցանկից' (pahvogneri tsankits) meaning 'list of saved ones'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ներդրեք ֆայլերի ընտրիչ, որպեսզի օգտվողները կարողանան ստանել ցանկացած ֆայլ պահվողների ցանկից:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term '埋め込みます' (umekomimasu) while technically correct, is a more formal and slightly stiff way to express 'embed'. A more natural and user-friendly phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ファイルセレクタを表示します (Fairu seerekuuta o hyōji shimasu) - 'Display a file selector'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation conveys the general meaning, '任意のファイル' (onna yō na fairu) is a bit too formal for a user-facing description. It translates literally to 'arbitrary file' which isn't the best wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 好きなファイル (suki na fairu) - 'favorite file' or 'desired file' would be more approachable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '파일 선택기를 임베드하세요' (file selector-eul imbedhaseyo) is a literal translation of 'Embed a file selector'. While understandable, a more natural and idiomatic Korean phrasing would be preferable. It sounds slightly unnatural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자가 이용 가능한 파일 목록에서 파일을 선택할 수 있는 기능을 추가하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The passive voice ('...할 수 있도록') feels slightly awkward in Korean for this context. While technically correct, a more active voice would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 사용자가 이용 가능한 파일 목록에서 파일을 선택할 수 있는 기능을 추가하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ບັນຊີລາຍຊື່' (bansi laisue) is a bit formal for this context. While technically correct, it might sound clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບັນຊີລາຍການໄຟລ໌ (bansi laiykan file) or just ລາຍການໄຟລ໌ (laiyan file)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ໄຟລ໌ໃດໆ' (file dai dai) is grammatically correct but can be improved for a more natural flow. While 'ໃດໆ' conveys 'any', it can sound slightly rigid.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ໄຟລ໌ທຸກລຸ້ນ (file thuk lun) - meaning 'all files' or ໄຟລ໌ທັງໝົດ (file thang mot) - meaning 'all files'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ieguliet failu atlasītāju, lai ļautu lietotājiem piekļūt jebkuram failam no pieejamo failu saraksta.' while understandable, is a bit wordy and not the most natural-sounding Latvian. A more concise and idiomatic translation would improve the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ieguliet failu atlasītāju, lai lietotāji varētu piekļūt jebkuram failam no pieejamā failu saraksta.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Integreer bestand selectie zodat gebruikers een willekeurig bestand uit de lijst met beschikbare bestanden kunnen openen" is not a direct and accurate translation of "Embed a file selector to allow users to access any file from the list of the available ones". "Embed" implies more than just allowing access; it suggests including it within something else. "Openen" (open) doesn't convey the same nuance as 'access'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integreer een bestand selectie functie, zodat gebruikers toegang hebben tot elk bestand uit de lijst met beschikbare bestanden.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Incorpore um seletor de arquivos para permitir que os usuários acessem qualquer arquivo da lista de arquivos disponíveis." is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing in Portuguese would be "Adicione um seletor de arquivos para permitir que os usuários acessem qualquer arquivo da lista disponível." or "Inclua um seletor de arquivos para permitir que os usuários acessem qualquer arquivo da lista disponível."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Adicione um seletor de arquivos para permitir que os usuários acessem qualquer arquivo da lista disponível.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Встроить селектор файлов, чтобы пользователи могли получить доступ к любому файлу из списка доступных." is a bit literal and slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would focus on the *ability* to select files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Предоставить селектор файлов, чтобы пользователи могли выбирать любые файлы из списка.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තිබෙන ගොනු ලැයිස්තුවේ ඕනෑම ගොනුවක් වෙත ප්‍රවේශය සඳහා පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ඉඩ දීමට' is not a natural or accurate rendering of 'Embed a file selector to allow users to access any file from the list of the available ones.'. It's a bit wordy and doesn't capture the 'embed' aspect.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින්ට ලබාගත් ගොනු ලැයිස්තුවෙන් ඕනෑම ගොනුවක් තෝරාගැනීමට හැකි වන පරිදි ගොනු තෝරණයක් ඇතුළත් කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට' is likely a misspelling. It should be 'පරිශීලකයින්ට'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පරිශීලකයින්ට

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Vdelajte izbiranje datotek, da uporabnikom omogočite dostop do katere koli datoteke iz seznama razpoložljivih." is a bit literal and could be more natural. 'Vdelajte' implies embedding in a more technical sense. A more user-friendly phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Omogočite izbiro datotek, da uporabnikom omogočite dostop do katere koli datoteke iz razpoložljivega seznama.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'razpoložljivih' is a bit clunky.  While grammatically correct, a slight change improves flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: razpoložljivega seznama

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Уградите селектор датотека" is not the most natural way to express "Embed a file selector." A more accurate translation would be something like "Уметните селектор датотека" or "Додајте селектор датотека".  "Уградите" implies embedding something into something else.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Уметните селектор датотека

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'omogućili' is grammatically correct but slightly formal for this context. A more conversational and common way to express "to allow" would be 'moglo da pristupi'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: moglo da pristupi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'било којој датотеци' is correct but could be slightly improved for clarity. While technically correct, it's a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ба било којој датотеци

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ugradite selektor datoteka da biste korisnicima omogućili pristup bilo kojoj datoteci sa liste dostupnih' is a bit literal and doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'Embed a file selector'. 'Ugradite' implies installation, while 'embed' suggests integration. A more natural translation would be something along the lines of 'Integrirajte selektor datoteka...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Integrirajte selektor datoteka da biste korisnicima omogućili pristup bilo kojoj datoteci sa liste dostupnih.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Kullanıcıların mevcut dosyalar listesinden herhangi bir dosyaya erişmesine izin vermek için bir dosya seçici yerleştirin.' is a literal translation but could be improved for clarity and natural flow in Turkish. While technically correct, it sounds somewhat clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Kullanıcıların erişebileceği dosya listesinden dosya seçmelerini sağlamak için bir dosya seçici ekleyin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Вбудуйте засіб вибору файлів, щоб надати користувачам доступ до будь-якого файлу зі списку доступних' is a bit literal and less natural in Ukrainian. A more fluent translation would emphasize the purpose of the file selector.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розмістіть компонент вибору файлів, щоб користувачі могли легко обирати файли зі списку.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'доступних' is grammatically correct, but 'зі списку' is a little clunky. It implies a static list which might not always be the case.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розмістіть компонент вибору файлів, щоб користувачі могли легко обирати файли зі списку.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '让用户能够访问允许列表中的文件' is a bit literal and doesn't fully capture the intended meaning of 'allow users to access any file from the list of the available ones'. It implies a pre-approved or permitted list, rather than all available files.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 嵌入文件选择器，以便用户可以访问可用的文件列表。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase '让用户能够' can be slightly improved for conciseness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 让用户可以
